result.eng: My father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.
result.ga: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsa

result.ponchtml: Tá Toyota ag m'aṫair aċ tá Ford agamsaMy father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.
